TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LogicalTreeHelper extends System.Object
public ref class LogicalTreeHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于查询逻辑树中的对象的静态帮助器方法。

span.span: Provides static helper methods for querying objects in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了可用于返回子对象的集合，或从逻辑树的子节点中的特定对象的方法。The class provides methods that you can use to return child collections of objects, or specific objects from within subnodes of the logical tree. 但是，大部分通常执行的对象树操作还公开了类似的方法或属性上或。However, most of the object tree operations that you typically perform are also exposed by similar methods or properties on or . 例如，请尝试以下操作：For example, try the following: - 而不是调用静态方法中，它将返回一个枚举器的逻辑子对象，使用该对象在内容模型中公开的专用的集合。Instead of calling the static method, which returns an enumerator for the logical child objects, use the dedicated collection exposed in the content model for that object. 支持内容模型的几乎所有对象都公开，包含的子对象的集合，并提供有关该集合的集合接口直接支持某些属性。Nearly all objects that support a content model expose some property that contains the collection of child objects, and provides collection interface support directly on that collection. - 而不是调用静态方法来通过指定其名称，调用获取子对象或对特定对象的方法。Instead of calling the static method to obtain a child object by specifying its name, call the or method on specific objects. 是最适用于分析情况下，您旅行时向上或向下逻辑树以递归方式将通过多个级别，并且想要使用一致的方法用于检查各种父或子对象。 is most useful for analysis scenarios where you are traveling up or down the logical tree recursively through multiple levels, and want to use a consistent approach for examining the various parent or child objects. 在这种情况下，您可能会访问混合内容模型，并使用多个内容模型特定的 Api 可能会过于复杂。In this case, you might be accessing a mixture of content models, and using the more content-model specific APIs would be too complex.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BringIntoView (System.Windows.DependencyObject current);
.method public static hidebysig void BringIntoView(class System.Windows.DependencyObject current) cil managed
Public Shared Sub BringIntoView (current As DependencyObject)
public: static void BringIntoView(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ current);
static member BringIntoView : System.Windows.DependencyObject -> unit

param.name: current
param.span: 要使其可见的 UI 元素。

span.span: The UI element to bring into view.

summary.span: 尝试使所请求的 UI 元素可见，并在目标上引发 事件以报告结果。

span.span: Attempts to bring the requested UI element into view and raises the event on the target in order to report the results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常调用实例方法更加方便或而不是此静态实用工具方法。It is typically more convenient to call the instance methods or rather than this static utility method. 实例方法的行为相当于静态方法的行为。The behavior of the instance methods is equivalent to the behavior of the static method. 即使`current`提供的 UI 元素是，生成的事件是否仍为相同事件，具有起源身份通过检查事件的事件数据。Even if the `current` UI element provided was a , the resulting event is still the same event, with the originating identifiable by checking the event data of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.DependencyObject FindLogicalNode (System.Windows.DependencyObject logicalTreeNode, string elementName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DependencyObject FindLogicalNode(class System.Windows.DependencyObject logicalTreeNode, string elementName) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindLogicalNode (logicalTreeNode As DependencyObject, elementName As String) As DependencyObject
public: static System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ FindLogicalNode(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ logicalTreeNode, System::String ^ elementName);
static member FindLogicalNode : System.Windows.DependencyObject * string -> System.Windows.DependencyObject

span.span: The object to start searching from.
This object must be either a or a .
The name of the object to find.

summary.span: 尝试查找并返回具有指定名称的对象。

span.span: Attempts to find and return an object that has the specified name.

summary.span: 搜索从指定对象开始，并持续到逻辑树的子节点中。

span.span: The search starts from the specified object and continues into subnodes of the logical tree.

returns.span: 如果找到一个，则为具有匹配名称的元素；如果没有在逻辑树中找到匹配名称，则返回 。

span.span: The object with the matching name, if one is found; returns if no matching name was found in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法并看起来类似于，但由不同的逻辑运行：The methods and are superficially similar to , but operate by different logic: - 搜索方向将是朝向 （树向下）; 的子对象的搜索方向`FindName`方法是向父对象 （向上树）。The search direction for is toward child objects (down the tree); the search direction for the `FindName` methods is towards parent objects (up the tree). - `FindName`方法受 XAML 名称范围的概念。The `FindName` methods are governed by the concept of a XAML namescope. 使用`FindName`保证只有一个该名称的对象存在，因为 XAML 名称范围强制实现唯一性。Using `FindName` you are guaranteed that only one object of that name exists, because XAML namescopes enforce uniqueness. 与此相反，在搜索过程中忽略 XAML 名称范围，并可能跨 XAML 名称范围边界。In contrast, ignores XAML namescope and might cross XAML namescope boundaries during the search. 在这种情况下，则不能保证唯一性的`elementName`命名一旦跨越边界。As such, there is no guarantee of uniqueness of the `elementName` name once boundaries are crossed. 有关 XAML 名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML 名称范围](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about XAML namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).

summary.span: 通过处理逻辑树，返回指定对象的直接子对象的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of immediate child objects of the specified object by processing the logical tree.

span.span: The object from which to start processing the logical tree.
This is expected to be either a or .

summary.span: 通过处理逻辑树返回指定的对象的即时子对象集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of immediate child objects of the specified object, by processing the logical tree.

returns.span: 来自指定对象逻辑树的即时子对象的可枚举集合。

span.span: The enumerable collection of immediate child objects from the logical tree of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此签名和帮助程序方法主要是不确定是否`current`是或，并且还不确定该对象的类是否支持其自己的内容模型的集合。Use this signature and helper method primarily when you are unsure whether `current` is a or and are also unsure whether that object's class supports its own content model collection. 如果可以确定正在查询的对象的类型，请检查您知道的特定内容属性存在于该类型上。If you can determine the type of the object you are querying, check the specific content property that you know exists on that type. 例如，如果您知道正在查询该对象是，检查属性来获取此集合接口支持，并可能比使用一个枚举器更有用的强类型的集合。For example, if you know that the object you are querying is an , check the property to get a strongly typed collection, which has collection interface support and is probably more useful than an enumerator.

The requested parent object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是只是获取适当的类型版本的包装器 (或) 的或属性，除非您不能确定`current`类型，您可能需要检查在相应而是实例属性。This method is merely a wrapper that gets the appropriate type version ( or ) of the or property; so unless you are unable to determine the `current` type, you might want to check the respective instance properties instead.
